mapper.insert: insert into BASE_SHIPPER ( USABLE_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_IP, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_IP, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, DELETE_TIME, DELETE_IP, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_USER_NAME, ORDER_CODE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ID , NAME , CODE , IS_DEFAULT ) values ( #{usable_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{create_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{create_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{modify_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{modify_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{modify_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delete_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{delete_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delete_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delete_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{delete_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{order_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.delete:
delete from BASE_SHIPPER where ID in
#{item}
mapper.update:
update BASE_SHIPPER
USABLE_STATUS=#{usable_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME=#{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_IP=#{create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_ID=#{create_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_NAME=#{create_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME=#{modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_IP=#{modify_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_ID=#{modify_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_NAME=#{modify_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_TIME=#{delete_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_IP=#{delete_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_FLAG=#{delete_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_USER_ID=#{delete_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_USER_NAME=#{delete_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CODE=#{order_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1=#{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2=#{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3=#{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4=#{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5=#{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID=#{id,jdbcType=CHAR},
NAME=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DEFAULT=#{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select BASE_SHIPPER.USABLE_STATUS, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_TIME, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_IP, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_USER_ID, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_USER_NAME, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_TIME, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_IP, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_USER_ID, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_USER_NAME, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_TIME, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_IP, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_FLAG, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_USER_ID, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_USER_NAME, BASE_SHIPPER.ORDER_CODE, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE1, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE2, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE3, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE4, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE5, BASE_SHIPPER.ID as id, BASE_SHIPPER.NAME as name, BASE_SHIPPER.CODE as code, BASE_SHIPPER.IS_DEFAULT as isDefault from BASE_SHIPPER where BASE_SHIPPER.ID=#{id}

select BASE_SHIPPER.ID as id, BASE_SHIPPER.NAME as name, BASE_SHIPPER.CODE as code, BASE_SHIPPER.IS_DEFAULT as isDefault from BASE_SHIPPER
order by ${orderStr}

select BASE_SHIPPER.USABLE_STATUS, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_TIME, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_IP, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_USER_ID, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_USER_NAME, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_TIME, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_IP, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_USER_ID, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_USER_NAME, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_TIME, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_IP, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_FLAG, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_USER_ID, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_USER_NAME, BASE_SHIPPER.ORDER_CODE, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE1, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE2, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE3, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE4, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE5, BASE_SHIPPER.ID as id, BASE_SHIPPER.NAME as name, BASE_SHIPPER.CODE as code, BASE_SHIPPER.IS_DEFAULT as isDefault from BASE_SHIPPER
order by ${orderStr}

select BASE_SHIPPER.USABLE_STATUS, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_TIME, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_IP, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_USER_ID, BASE_SHIPPER.CREATE_USER_NAME, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_TIME, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_IP, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_USER_ID, BASE_SHIPPER.MODIFY_USER_NAME, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_TIME, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_IP, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_FLAG, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_USER_ID, BASE_SHIPPER.DELETE_USER_NAME, BASE_SHIPPER.ORDER_CODE, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE1, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE2, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE3, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE4, BASE_SHIPPER.ATTRIBUTE5, BASE_SHIPPER.ID as id, BASE_SHIPPER.NAME as name, BASE_SHIPPER.CODE as code, BASE_SHIPPER.IS_DEFAULT as isDefault from BASE_SHIPPER
order by ${orderStr}
mapper.update:
begin
update BASE_SHIPPER
USABLE_STATUS=#{item.usable_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME=#{item.create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_IP=#{item.create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_ID=#{item.create_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_NAME=#{item.create_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME=#{item.modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_IP=#{item.modify_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_ID=#{item.modify_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_NAME=#{item.modify_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_TIME=#{item.delete_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_IP=#{item.delete_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_FLAG=#{item.delete_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_USER_ID=#{item.delete_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DELETE_USER_NAME=#{item.delete_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CODE=#{item.order_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1=#{item.attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2=#{item.attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3=#{item.attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4=#{item.attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5=#{item.attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID=#{item.id,jdbcType=CHAR},
NAME=#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE=#{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_DEFAULT=#{item.isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID=#{item.id}
;end;
mapper.insert:
insert into BASE_SHIPPER ( USABLE_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_IP, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_NAME, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_IP, MODIFY_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_NAME, DELETE_TIME, DELETE_IP, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_USER_ID, DELETE_USER_NAME, ORDER_CODE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ID , NAME , CODE , IS_DEFAULT )
select #{item.usable_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.create_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.create_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.create_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.modify_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.modify_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.modify_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.modify_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.delete_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.delete_ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.delete_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.delete_user_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.delete_user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.order_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR} from dual
